helpCard.title: How Meriter Works
helpCard.content: Transfer points from your publications and comments to your available balance to use them freely. Transfer your available balance to publications and comments to increase their visibility and ranking. The more points a publication or comment has, the higher it appears in feeds. You have 10 points of free upvote daily.
helpCard.reviewInSettings: You can review this help anytime in Settings
